alert.note: Alert for Nelson; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 11:56AM CST until January 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. * WHERE...Towner and Nelson Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief Blizzard conditions are possible in open country.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
